page.title: 07Golberdon
page.content: In{Golberdon}there is a grave yard. It has ninety graves. In our square we have a river called the{Lynher.}There is a beach at Golberdon. The land is owned by a man called{Henry Gorman. There are two bridges in Golberdon. {Bicton bridge and Kerney bridge.} In Golberdon there is a park and there are two{allotments.} Golberdon has got a small{chapel.}On Wednesday morning a bus comes and takes people where ever they want to go for 20p. In Golberdon there is a {quarry}on the other side the of the River Lynher. On the beach there are smooth stones you can sit on. It is a river side beach with a weir near it.
